text.tspan: Discovers Alice's OIDC Provider and Authorization Agent from WebID Document

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;

text.tspan: Authorization Agent finds Access Needs in Application's WebID Document

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400;
text.tspan: 👩 Alice grants access via consent screen based on Access Needs

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400;
text.tspan: Authorization Agent generates Access Grant and Access Receipt

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;

svg.text: Store Access Grant in Access Grants Registry 🗝️

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;

svg.text: Store Access Receipt in Application Registration 🗝️

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;
font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;

svg.text: Exchanges code for ID Token and (🔑 ) Access Token

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400;
text.tspan: ⚠️ Application uses WebID from ID Token

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400;
text.tspan: Application discovers its registration from ID Token
